item.title: Building a Raspberry Pi k8s Cluster
item.description: Building a Raspberry Pi Kubernetes Cluster Link to heading I built a Kubernetes cluster using 2 Raspberry Pi 4s and a Mac Mini. This blog is hosted on that cluster. I wanted to see if I could set up my own Kubernetes cluster with compute lying around my house and that which I could buy myself. The constraint was that I couldn’t use any cloud services, not even for networking so I’d have to find a way to expose the cluster myself.
